channel.title: Lecture2 on STAT-5526 Fall 2020
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture2 on STAT-5526 Fall 2020

item.title: Lecture 2A - Monte Carlo - Work in Process
item.description: Monte Carlo coming soon … plot(cars) Add a new chunk by clicking the Insert Chunk button on the toolbar or by pressing Cmd+Option+I. When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the Preview button or press Cmd+Shift+K to preview the HTML file). The preview shows you a rendered HTML copy of the contents of the editor. Consequently, unlike Knit, Preview does not run any R code chunks.

item.title: Lecture 2B - Neural Networks - Work in Process
item.description: Neural networks coming soon … NN for linear regression NN for image classification - binary - categorical NN for image segmentation (stretch) plot(cars) Add a new chunk by clicking the Insert Chunk button on the toolbar or by pressing Cmd+Option+I. When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the Preview button or press Cmd+Shift+K to preview the HTML file).
